channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Gunshots at Brown University, Then 12 Hours of Lockdown and Fear
item.description: Students sheltered in place in classrooms and basements, waiting for the all clear.

item.title: Meetings are not work, says Southwest Airlines CEO—and he’s taking action, by blocking his calendar every afternoon from Wednesday to Friday
item.description: Southwest Airlines CEO Bob Jordan says too many execs mistake packed calendars for productivity. He’s found a ‘crazy’ solution.

item.title: What to Know About the Victims of the Bondi Beach Shooting
item.description: At least 15 people were killed in the attack in Sydney, Australia, including a 10-year-old girl, a long-serving rabbi and a Holocaust survivor.

item.title: I lead Microsoft’s enterprise AI agent strategy. Here’s what every company should know about how agents will rewrite work
item.description: History shows that breakthrough technologies don’t just slot into existing systems, they make us rethink those systems entirely.

item.title: Bittensor, the AI-linked cryptocurrency founded by a former Google engineer, just halved its supply. Here’s what that means
item.description: The mechanics of Bittensor mirror those of Bitcoin, the world’s largest cryptocurrency.

item.title: The Humanity Amid the Horror at Bondi Beach
item.description: We must not succumb to the darkness of hate and fear.

item.title: Michele Singer Reiner: A Photographer Who Changed Movie History
item.description: Falling in love with her inspired the director Rob Reiner to give “When Harry Met Sally…” a new ending. The Reiners went on to work together on movies...

item.title: Birkin bags can double in value in 5 years. An Hermès expert explains why it’s a better investment than gold
item.description: Thanks to its exclusivity and its status as an investment piece, a Birkin bag’s value is much higher than its sticker price of around $12,000.

item.title: Airbnb CEO Brian Chesky says he went to ‘night school’ for an hour every day with Barack Obama and even turned in homework
item.description: The billionaire founder admits a weekly mentorship call with the former president came with assignments like being more intentional with his friendshi...

item.title: Australian Police Plan to Charge Suspect in Bondi Massacre
item.description: Officials said a father and son killed at least 15 people at a Jewish holiday celebration. More than three dozen others were hospitalized, including a...

item.title: Olivia Dean, Josh Johnson and Chase Infiniti Are Among Our 2025 Breakout Stars
item.description: Across the arts, these 10 performers took a leap of faith this year and stuck the landing in a big way.

item.title: Australian Leaders Promise to Tighten Gun Laws After Bondi Beach Attack
item.description: The prime minister’s office said officials agreed that Australia needed “immediate” reform, including new restrictions on who is allowed to own firear...

item.title: After Bondi Beach Attack, Australia Is Urged to Act Faster Against Antisemitism
item.description: Jillian Segal, the country’s special envoy to combat antisemitism, said the deadly incident was shocking but not surprising amid a rise in violence ta...

item.title: Deadly Attack on U.S. Troops Poses Growing Challenge for Syria’s Leader
item.description: The attack further complicates President Ahmed al-Sharaa’s efforts to unify the country and rebuild relationships with the international community, an...
